info.title: Swagger Json
info.description: This is a generated swagger json for your sails project

LimitQueryParam.name: limit
LimitQueryParam.description: The maximum number of records to send back (useful for pagination). Defaults to undefined

SkipQueryParam.name: skip
SkipQueryParam.description: The number of records to skip (useful for pagination).

SortQueryParam.name: sort
SortQueryParam.description: The sort order. By default, returned records are sorted by primary key value in ascending order. e.g. ?sort=lastName%20ASC

PageQueryParam.name: page
PageQueryParam.description: This helps with pagination and when the limit is known

SelectQueryParam.name: select
SelectQueryParam.description: This helps with what to return for the user and its "," delimited

TokenHeaderParam.name: token
TokenHeaderParam.description: Incase we want to send header inforamtion along our request

IDPathParam.name: id
IDPathParam.description: This is to identify a particular object out

PerPageQueryParam.name: perPage
PerPageQueryParam.description: This helps with pagination and when the limit is known for pagify
